title: @Riot, Your Music Is Amazing
body:
The login themes of 2016 have especially been really great, and I'd like to listen to them frequently, and while I'm playing the game itself.

The only issue I have with this, however, is that the only places I can reliably find them are YouTube and the actual client, among a few other sources that give me a lot of ping/connection issues in-game.

What I'm saying is it would be awesome if you put some of your later tracks+more login themes on something like Spotify, where I can listen to them conveniently, because they're awesome!

replies.body:
Hey there Ackelope,

Here's a bunch of the stuff that's on [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/47mIJdHORyRerp4os813jD).

As far as having ping or connection issues, you could always head over to the [League SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends) and download the tracks so that you can listen to them offline, interwebs free.

First off, thanks for the reply, it's nice to see you took the time to inform me. Second off, I was aware of the current amount on Spotify, it just doesn't contain some of the later tracks (namely login themes of 2015-2016), those being the ones I'd like to see there.

Overall you're right though, it's just me being lazy more than anything else, and not taking the time to go and download something off of SoundCloud. Thanks for allowing me to realize that more easily.
It would be ideal to get everything on Spotify!
the fact my DoTA 2 friend takes 20 minutes in the login screen because they don't make new music often in DoTA 2 tilts me rito pls
Considering the Universe recently launched... Why doesn't Riot add champion log-in themes to the characters they belong to? Imo that would be a really neat touch.

The login-theme music should be on the champion pages in Universe. For example, if you are a fan of Kindred's - http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/kindred
- scroll down the page a bit and you'll see it there :)
 
Enjoy

That's really cool! I went to check out other champions that have had login themes though (like Aatrox) to find their music missing. Will those be added into the future?

Soooo happy that Diana's theme is there :)

I see those videos are hosted on LoL's youtube channel. The channel features a few playlists, mostly champion spotlights per year. Would you mind making a playlist for login screens, too? (ideally one for champ-only logins, and one for all login screens)
The music is one of the things Riot does right -- but then, I suppose the greedy suits can't really have much influence on it.

Yeah that isn't quite what I'm looking for. Things like YouTube eat up the bandwidth and aren't the most convenient when listening on the go, if Riot put more of their stuff on a music-specific application like Spotify, it would be great, since I haven't been able to find them there yet.
